import AllBlogs from './AllBlogs' import Footer from '../Footer' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Header from '../Header'; const Blogs = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { async function fetchData() { try { fetch('/Blogs/') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((json) => { console.log("JSON: ", json) let data = JSON.parse(json) setProducts(data) console.log("response", data) setLoading(false); }) } catch (error) { console.log("ERROR LOGS: ", error); } // }, 10000); } fetchData(); }, []); // if (loading) { // return
